txt.en: '[placeholder], rumour has come to my ear of troubles in the Entwash Vale, Riding of Reeve Ingbert of the House of LÃ©otharn. It is said that goblins and Orcs out of the Misty Mountains have descended upon the Riding and are preparing to lay siege upon Eaworth.\n\n'If you wish to be of aid to the Eastemnet, journey west to Eaworth and offer your services to Reeve Ingbert. I am sure that he will be grateful for the assistance. The people of Faldham must carry on under their own defences, but we will not forget your aid.'
'Hold there, stranger! You come at a dire time and the doors of the Mead Hall are closed.'
Thane Elfmar has heard rumours of trouble in the Entwash Vale.
Talk to Reeve Ingbert at Eaworth in the Entwash Vale
Reeve Ingbert is at Eaworth in the Entwash Vale, west of Faldham.\n\nThane Elfmar has asked you to journey to Eaworth and offer your services to Reeve Ingbert.
